MS MCQs

    Create and manage environments in Dataverse

    »

    1. An environment in Dataverse can contain all of the following except which one?

      Power Apps apps

      Power Automate flows

      Many instances of Dataverse databases

      A single Dataverse database


    2. Security roles are used for all of the following except which one?

      Limiting Access to data

      Restricting access to an environment

      Restricting actions that users can perform on data

      Restricting printing


    3. Which of the following is not a type of security role?

      User

      Global Security Role

      Environment Maker

      Delegate
